recipe.title: Strawberries with Marsala
ingredients: 2 lb strawberries (2 qt), trimmed, halved if large
instructions: Toss together strawberries, sugar, and Marsala until sugar is dissolved. Let macerate at room temperature, tossing occasionally, 30 minutes before serving.
Toss together strawberries, sugar, and Marsala until sugar is dissolved.
Let macerate at room temperature, tossing occasionally, 30 minutes before serving.
